solution_line_template: He makes $300 selling the books because {num_books} x {price_per_book} = <<{num_books}*{price_per_book}={money_from_books}>>{money_from_books}
He spends $225 on records because {num_records_bought} x {cost_per_record} = <<{num_records_bought}*{cost_per_record}={money_spent_on_records}>>{money_spent_on_records}
